orange: Census in past 15 years or is due in next 2 years
red: Last census more than 15 years ago

orange: Survey in past 5 years or due in next year
red: Last survey more than 5 years ago

green: 3 or more surveys in past 10 years
red: 1 or no surveys in past 10 years

orange: Survey in past 5 years or due in next year
red: Last survey more than 5 years ago

green: Operational: more than 75% of births are registered
orange: Expanding: more than 40% of births registered
red: No system or less than 40% of births are registered

green: Operational: more than 75% of deaths are registered
orange: Expanding: some data provided to vital statistics
red: No operational system or no data provided to vital statistics

green: National coverage of all health facilties
National coverage of all education facilties
